animal.question: I meow and love to chase string. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🐾 I have soft paws.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🏡 I protect your house.
🎾 I like to fetch.

animal.question: I quack and swim in the pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I eat seeds and grass.
🐥 My babies are called ducklings.
🌊 I have webbed feet.

animal.question: I say 'Moo' and give milk. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I eat grass in a field.
🥛 We get cheese from my milk.
⚫ I often have black and white spots.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐘 I am the largest land animal.
💧 I use my trunk to spray water.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 Each of us has a unique pattern.
🌿 I eat grass.
🐎 I look like a horse.

animal.question: I hop around and carry my baby in a pouch. What am I?

hints.text: 🇦🇺 I am from Australia.
🦘 I can jump very high.
🌱 I eat plants.

animal.question: I roar loudly and I'm known as the King of the Jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a big mane.
🥩 I eat meat.
☀️ I live in Africa.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I have spots.
🌳 I am the tallest mammal.
🌿 I eat acacia leaves.

animal.question: I am a clever primate with a love for bananas, often mimicking human actions. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I swing from trees.
🍌 I peel my food before eating it.
👪 I live in groups called troops.

cosmos.question: I twinkle in the night sky, and I'm very, very far away. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I shine with my own light!
🔭 You can see many of me with a telescope.
🌟 I'm like our Sun, but much farther.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of rock that goes around the Sun. You live on me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌎 I am the third planet from the Sun.
🌱 I have lots of plants and animals.
💧 I am mostly covered in water.

cosmos.question: I am Earth's best friend in space, and I glow in the night. What am I?

hints.text: 🌑 I change my shape!
👩‍🚀 Astronauts have walked on me.
🧀 Some people say I look like cheese.

cosmos.question: I am hot, bright and give Earth light during the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am a giant star!
😎 You should never look directly at me!
🌻 Plants need my light to grow.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture. Sometimes you can use me to find North. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 One well known one looks like a bear.
🌌 People have been making stories about me for thousands of years.
✨ Many of them have names from Greek myths.

cosmos.question: I am a cold, rocky object that orbits the Sun, but I am much smaller than a planet. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I can sometimes have a tail when I get close to the sun.
👨‍🚀 We have sent probes to study me up close.
👨‍🌾 There is one that used to be a planet.

cosmos.question: I am a very big group of stars, gas, and dust, all held together by gravity. Our Sun is part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I can be spiral shaped, like a whirlpool.
✨ I contain billions of stars.
🥛 Our home is called the Milky Way.

cosmos.question: I am a group of planets that orbit around a star. Earth is part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪐 I include eight major planets.
☀️ I am held together by the star's gravity.
🌍 I am named after the star at my center.

cosmos.question: I am a long way out from the Sun and I am known as the 'Red Planet'. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 People might travel to me in the future!
🔴 I have a reddish color because of the iron in my soil.
🤖 Rovers have explored my surface.

cosmos.question: I am a very, very big explosion of a star. I am super bright! What am I?

hints.text: 💥 I am more powerful than any fireworks.
✨ After I happen, I can leave behind a black hole.
💀 I am the end of a very big star's life.
